column1: Little Goat Diner////As a huge Top Chef fan
column2: I was so excited to come here. I went for breakfast on a weekend
column3: so there was a pretty long wait. I didn't mind too much because I expected it
column4: but it's never fun to wait. They don't take reservations
column5: so you have to be prepared for that. I got the Elvis waffles & they blew me away. It's not often that breakfast food really gets you
column6: but holy crap was it good!
